Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO HIGHER EDUCATION

Title: Allows for a certain amount of required clinical training and competency to be completed through simulation experience
Summary: Allows for at least one-third of required clinical training and competency for licensing as a registered professional nurse, licensed practical nurse, and nurse practitioner to be completed through simulation experience.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to allowing for a certain amount of required clinical training and competency for licensing as a registered professional nurse, licensed practical nurse, and nurse practitioner to be completed through simulation experience
